description:
Classic elbow macaroni in rich creamy sauce made from a blend of parmesan, Romano, and cheddar. A hearty serving of comfort food to enjoy anywhere.

  • Ingredients: pasta (ground durum wheat semolina, water, egg albumen and salt), cheddar cheese (pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes, annatto), parmesan cheese (parmesan cheese (cultured part-skim milk, salt, enzymes), disodium phosphate), whole milk (rbst-free), butter sauce (modified corn starch, salt, whey solids, non-fat dry milk, dehydrated butter, natural butter flavor, sugar, xanthan gum, lactic acid, turmeric and annatto), onion, sea salt, bacon flavor (maltodextrin, bacon type flavor (sunflower oil, smoke flavor, with other natural flavors), rice starch, salt, tocopherol (vitamin e)), black pepper, turmeric, nutmeg
  • Allergens: contains eggs, milk, gluten, and wheat
  • Note - Rehydration time doubles every 5,000 feet of elevation gain. Backpacker’s Pantry estimated their rehydration times based on a 5,000 foot altitude
name: Backpacker's Pantry Three Cheese Mac  & Cheese
